comments.snippet: I can confirm this. Version 1.76.20 automatically closes empty panels. V1.77 Prerelease and Nightly build don't close the panel after closing the last tab. Additionally, launching an external app created a new panel that doesn't close if the external app is not integrated. Version 1.76 doesn't leave an empty panel open in this case.
